Module com.bcs2024.knapsack
Package com.bcs2024.knapsack.algorithm

Class GeneticKnapsackSolver

java.lang.Object
com.bcs2024.knapsack.algorithm.GeneticKnapsackSolver
public class GeneticKnapsackSolver extends Object
GeneticKnapsackSolver implements a genetic algorithm to solve the knapsack problem. It initializes a population of chromosomes (solutions), evaluates their fitness, applies crossover and mutation to produce new generations, and selects the best solution.

    • GeneticKnapsackSolver

      public GeneticKnapsackSolver()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to start the knapsack problem solver.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used).

    • solve

      public void solve()
      Solves the knapsack problem using a genetic algorithm. The algorithm involves initializing a population of chromosomes, evaluating the fitness of each chromosome, applying crossover and mutation to create a new population, and repeating until a maximum number of generations is reached.

    • initializePopulation

      private void initializePopulation()
      Initializes the population of chromosomes with random genes and rotations.

    • evaluateFitness

      private void evaluateFitness(List<Chromosome> population)
      Evaluates the fitness of each chromosome in the population by calculating the total value of the cargo space. The fitness is set to the total value of the cargo space.
      Parameters:
      population - The population of chromosomes to be evaluated.

    • tournamentSelection

      private Chromosome tournamentSelection(int tournamentSize)
      Selects a chromosome from the population using tournament selection. Tournament selection involves selecting a random subset of chromosomes from the population and selecting the chromosome with the highest fitness.
      Parameters:
      tournamentSize - The size of the tournament to be held.
      Returns:
      The chromosome with the highest fitness from the tournament.

    • crossover

      private void crossover()
      Applies crossover to the chromosomes in the population with a probability defined by CROSSOVER_RATE. Crossover involves selecting two parents from the population using tournament selection, selecting a random crossover point, and swapping the genes of the parents to produce two offspring.

    • mutation

      private void mutation()
      Applies mutation to the chromosomes in the population with a probability defined by the mutation rate. Mutation involves randomly changing the type and rotation of genes in a chromosome.

    • isValid

      private boolean isValid(Chromosome chromo)
      Checks the validity of a chromosome by verifying if it can be placed in the cargo space and has a positive total value.
      Parameters:
      chromo - The chromosome to be validated.
      Returns:
      true if the chromosome is valid; otherwise, false.

    • applyBestSolution

      private void applyBestSolution()
      Applies the best solution (chromosome) found by the genetic algorithm to the cargo space.
